title: No promised skin (Cosmic Queen Ashe) from watching worlds?
body:
Recently, me and a couple of friends had went to watch worlds in a nearby cinema (Innaloo Event cinema, located in Perth WA), and received a merchandise bag filled with some league goodies. However, we did not receive the promised Cosmic Queen Ashe skin that was supposedly given if we were to order a ticket online. I found this was the same with everyone else who watched Worlds as well. I have pictures of me and my friends tickets if it were to help in redeeming the skin.

Please help!

replies.body:
>Hey guys! Thanks for checking in on this. The skin codes should be emailed out by Event in the next couple of days - it's a digital process rather than a physical skin card!

>There are some technical limitations that mean the codes can only be sent out AFTER the viewing - apologies for the confusion, we need to be better about setting expectations here.

https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/6jGZAhT1/d/FO615RxE?comment=0006
Went to the same place, didn't get the skin code promised, I've already got the skin, but my friends have not.
Yeah same still dont know how to get skin

The same thing happened to me and a group of my friends when we went to watch worlds at Event Cinemas Marion in SA, and none of us have the skin, nor have any of the codes on the tickets worked in the redeem section of the launcher.
